title: Cant open league of legends
body:
Hi, when i went to open up league of legends, the league of legends icon popped up, and nothing happened, i waited about 10 minutes and still nothing, so i clicked on the icon and it said that pvp.net kernal is not responding, its the same on my brothers computer too, both on windows 8.
I am not able to open up facebook on my computer or update my java.
Anyone know what the problem is and know how to fix it?

replies.body:
pvp.net patcher kernal was on process's when i opened up task manager.
Ive tried running it on administrator mode. its still not working....

Please use the "Reply" feature of the board to reply to a comment, otherwise the person won't get notification of your message.

Are you still getting this issue?
Could you open Task manager (Press Ctrl + Alt + Delete) and check for LolClient.exe or LolPatcher.exe

Have you tried opening it again and waiting another ten minutes? It could just be a pre-patcher patch.

If that doesn't work, try running it in administrator mode.
